Parameters: String: the name of the property to listen on
PropertyChangeListenerProxy(java.lang.St.Description: Constructor which binds the PropertyChangeListener to a specific property.

Returns: the name of the named property associated with the listener
getPropertyName().Description: Returns the name of the named property associated with the listener.

propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChange.Description: Forwards the property change event to the listener delegate.

ClassDesc: A class which extends the EventListenerProxy specifically for adding a PropertyChangeListener with a "bound" property. Instances of this class can be added as PropertyChangeListeners to a bean which supports firing property change events. If the object has a getPropertyChangeListeners method then the array returned could be a mixture of PropertyChangeListener and PropertyChangeListenerProxy objects.
